evidence.text: Person B: It was called... 'The Pink Opaque.'

Person A: Of course I remember The Pink Opaque, Maddy. It's my favorite TV show of all time.
Person A: Always will be.

Person B: You can't tell anybody about this. Not like last time. You have to promise.
Person B: You have to promise.
Person A: Okay, Maddy. Jesus. I promise.

Person B: That's not my name.
Person B: I told you. That's not my name.
Person B: Those memories were put there to distract you. To keep you trapped.
